subject: Bug: /api/voice/events returning empty response
body:
## Issue

Endpoint returns empty response (no JSON, no error).

## Test Command
```bash
curl -s 'https://calendarbeaf-prod.azurewebsites.net/api/voice/events?appId=1&start=2026-01-06&end=2026-01-12&limit=5'
```

## Expected
JSON with events or empty events array.

## Actual
Blank/empty response.

Need to check if function is registered correctly in app.js and responding.

-- Cronas
